verses.verse: (A psalm written for people going up to the temple to worship) All you people who serve Yahweh, who stand up and ◄serve/pray to► him at night in his temple, come and praise him!
Lift up your hands/arms to pray to him in the temple and praise him!
And I hope/wish that Yahweh, who created heaven and the earth, will bless you from where he lives in the temple on Zion Hill!
